channel.title: JshMllr - The Journal Portfolio of Josh Miller

item.title: Hello World
item.description: With the growing community interest in Gatsby, I decided to deploy a static site so I could learn more about React and modern headless CMS tech.
item.dc:creator: Josh Miller
